pkgmetadata.longdescription: Epson Scan 2 is Linux software for Epson scanners and multifunction printer. Epson Scan 2 has own front-end, it allows to set various scanner settings with graphical user interface and save the scanned images to the various file type. It supports USB and network connection for the network capable scanners. Scanner can be controlled via not only own front-end but also command line option.
